code: protected Endpoint createEndpoint(String uri, String remaining, Map<String, Object> parameters) throws Exception {     String name = StringHelper.before(remaining, ":").     String script = StringHelper.after(remaining, ":").     // no script then remaining is the language name     if (name == null && script == null) {         name = remaining.     }     if (ObjectHelper.isEmpty(name)) {         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Illegal syntax. Name of language not given in uri: " + uri).     }     Language language = getCamelContext().resolveLanguage(name).     String resourceUri = null.     String resource = script.     if (resource != null) {         if (resource.startsWith(RESOURCE)) {             resource = resource.substring(RESOURCE.length()).         }         if (ResourceHelper.hasScheme(resource)) {             // the script is a uri for a resource             resourceUri = resource.             // then the script should be null             script = null.         } else {             // the script is provided as text in the uri, so decode to utf-8             script = URLDecoder.decode(script, "UTF-8").             // then the resource should be null             resourceUri = null.         }     }     LanguageEndpoint endpoint = new LanguageEndpoint(uri, this, language, null, resourceUri).     endpoint.setScript(script).     setProperties(endpoint, parameters).     return endpoint. }
